# SROI Walkthrough

This notebook estimates a Social Return on Investment (SROI) from simulated project data.

## ğŸ“¦ Packages Required

```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
```

## ğŸ“‚ Load Data

```{r}
sroi_data <- read.csv("sroi_sample.csv")
head(sroi_data)
```

## ğŸ”¢ Calculate SROI

```{r}
sroi_result <- sroi_data %>%
  mutate(sroi_ratio = outcome_value / cost)

kable(sroi_result)

mean_sroi <- mean(sroi_result$sroi_ratio)
cat("Average SROI Ratio:", round(mean_sroi, 2))
```

## ğŸ“ˆ Visualise SROI per Intervention

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(sroi_result, aes(x = intervention, y = sroi_ratio)) +
  geom_col(fill = "steelblue") +
  labs(title = "SROI Ratio by Intervention", y = "SROI Ratio", x = "Intervention") +
  theme_minimal()
```

## ğŸ§ª Sanity Checks

```{r}
stopifnot(all(sroi_data$cost > 0))
stopifnot(all(sroi_data$outcome_value >= 0))
```
